Title.language: Doxology for St. John the Short

language.div: Doksologi untuk St. Yohanes si Pendek

comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Short:

language.div: Untuk Peringatan St. Yohanes si Pendek:

text.language: Akswpi gar n~ouvwct/r: n~refe~rouwini hijen pikahi: w~ pimakarioc e#y#u#: pao#c# n~iwt abba Iwann/c.
For you have become a star, of light upon the earth, O blessed and holy one, my master and father Abba John.

language.div: Karena kau telah menjadi bintang penerang bumi, hai yang diberkati dan kudus, guruku dan bapaku, Abba Yohanes.

text.language: صرت كوكبا منيرا على الأرض أيها الطوباوى الطاهر سيدى الآب أنبا يؤانس.
Hwcte hiten pekyebio~: nem pekbioc n~aggelikon: akes Sih/t t/rf n~ca pekt/b: m~v~r/] n~outeltili m~mwou.
That through your humility, and angelic life, you made Shiheet like the stars, with your finger.

language.div: Melalui kerendahan hatimu dan hidupmu yang seperti malaikat, kau buat Shiheet seperti bintang-bintang dengan jarimu.

text.language: حتى أنك من قبل تواضعك وسيرتك الملائكية اعتبرت كل شيهات كنقطة ماء فى أصبعك.
Ouoh akw~fi m~pekcwma: qen hanack/cic euqoci: san~tekswpi n~atkundinoc: qen pie~hoou n~te ]k~ricic.
And you subdued your body, with many ascetic pains, so that you may be blameless, in the day of judgment.

language.div: Dan kau taklukkan tubuhmu dengan penderitaan asketik (latihan rohani yang keras), agar engkau tidak bercela pada hari penghakiman.

text.language: و أقمعت جسدك بنسك متعب لتكون بغير شدة فى يوم الدينونة.
Akswpi n~lum/n n~ououjai: nirefmwout aktounocou: nidemwn akhitou e~bol: n/etswni aktal[wou.
You became a harbor of salvation, you have raised the dead, you have exorcised the demons, and you have healed the sick.

language.div: Kau jadi pelabuhan keselamatan, kau bangkitkan orang mati, kau usir roh jahat, dan sembuhkan orang sakit.

text.language: صرت ميناء خلاص أقمت الأموات وأخرجت الشياطين وشفيت المرضى.
Ouoh on akerp~emp~sa: pao#c# n~iwt abba Iwann/c: n~tekhemci nem nia~poctoloc: n~tek]hap n~tekgenea.
And also you were worthy, O my master and father Abba John, to sit with the Apostles, and judge your generation.

language.div: Kau layak, ya tuanku Abba Yohanes, untuk duduk bersama para Rasul, dan hakimi generasimu.

text.language: أيضا استحققت ياسيدى الآب أنبا يؤانس أن تجلس مع الرسل وتدين جيلك.
